page.title: 07TOURIST ATTRACTIONS
page.content: Down here in Porthleven we call tourists emmets or grockles. We have about five tourist shops in our village which sell things like badges, sea shells, postcards, toys, old guns and all sorts of things tourists buy. There are lots of Guest Houses, Bed and Breakfast places, four or five hotels and a large number of holiday flats and cottages around Porthleven. We have got two pubs and five eating places, not including the fish and chip shops. The trouble is Porthleven hasn't got many good parking areas. Porthleven is a village with a nice atmosphere but the weather sometimes spoils it and I'm afraid we haven't got many indoor activities. On the other hand if the weather is nice there are lots of outdoor activities such as swimming, putting, fishing, diving and some nice walks.
